long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 **Delete Instagram Messages Extension**

Tired of manually clearing out your Instagram messages? Say goodbye to the hassle with the Delete Instagram Messages extension for Chrome! Compatible with the latest Instagram UI, this tool is designed to simplify your social media experience.

✨ **Features:**

- **One-Click Deletion:** Easily delete all your Instagram messages with just one click.
  
- **Multi-Language Support:** Works seamlessly in all languages. Just make sure your Instagram language is set correctly before you start.

- **Marketplace & Page Inbox:** Perfectly integrates with Instagram's direct messages.

- **Updated for 2024:** Enjoy flawless performance with our most recent update.

🎉 **Free Trial:**

Start today with a Free Trial that lets you delete up to 15 messages. Experience the convenience before upgrading to the full version.

🌟 **How It Works:**

1. Install the Delete Instagram Messages extension for Chrome from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Go to [instagram.com/direct](https://www.instagram.com/direct).
3. Click on the extension icon.
4. Choose "Delete Messages" to clear your messages effortlessly.

🛡️ **Safe and Secure:**

Your privacy and security are our top priorities. We commit to regular updates to fix any bugs and ensure our extension meets the latest security standards. Review our privacy policy on the Chrome Web Store.

🔧 **Need Help?**

We're here for you! For assistance, bug reports, or suggestions, contact us at:

📧 Email: samzsakerz@gmail.com

Transform your Instagram messaging experience today with the Delete Instagram Messages extension. Managing your inbox has never been easier!
